Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add multi-session design document and update agent definitions

- Create claudedocs/multi-session-design.md with full multi-session architecture
  covering session isolation, file-based IPC, environment detection, Slack routing,
  Hook integration, and phased implementation plan \(Phase 0-6\)
- Update 4 existing agents \(architect, mcp-expert, slack-expert, scaffolder\)
  with multi-session knowledge and patterns
- Create 2 new agents \(session-specialist, hooks-specialist\)
  for session lifecycle management and Claude Code Hooks integration

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Migrate all JSON config files to .env environment variables

- Remove config/security.json and config/default.json in favor of .env
- Remove state/config.json runtime config
- Add comprehensive .env.example with Korean comments for beginners
- Add CONFIG loader \(src/shared/config.ts\) with envString/envNumber/envList helpers
- Add validateConfig\(\) that shows friendly error on missing required vars
- Update directory structure, Phase 0, and comparison table accordingly

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
